name: a grappling game why? why not
name_original: a grappling game why? why not
description:
A GRAPPLING GAME with 2 grappling hooks. small prototype will be adding more soon probably. only for windows for now.

why are graphics bad? am new to unity am still learning and i will be adding graphics and better models soon. not too long though.

the controlls are: e to fire left grapple and q to fire right grapple, hold shift to sprint, hold or click left mouse button, ctrl to crouch, and r to reload

game might lag.
